name: whisper-dictation
title: Whisper Dictation
description: A powerful dictation tool that uses Whisper for speech-to-text transcription, with AI-powered refinement options.
author: finjo

commands.name: dictate
commands.title: Dictate Text
commands.subtitle: Whisper Dictation
commands.description: Convert speech to text using Whisper

commands.name: download-model
commands.title: Download Whisper Model
commands.subtitle: Whisper Dictation
commands.description: Choose and download a model for transcription

commands.name: dictation-history
commands.title: Dictation History
commands.subtitle: Whisper Dictation
commands.description: View, copy, and manage past transcriptions

preferences.name: whisperExecutable
preferences.title: Whisper Executable Path
preferences.description: Path to whisper-cpp main executable. Default assumes Homebrew on Apple Silicon. Check /usr/local/bin/whisper-cli for Intel.

preferences.name: modelPath
preferences.title: Whisper Model Path
preferences.description: Path to your custom Whisper model file (.bin). Handled automatically if model downloaded through extension.

preferences.name: soxExecutablePath
preferences.title: SoX Executable Path
preferences.description: Full path to the 'sox' command-line audio utility. Default assumes Homebrew on Apple Silicon. Check /usr/local/bin/sox for Intel.

preferences.name: defaultAction
preferences.title: Default Action After Transcription
preferences.description: Action to perform automatically after transcription completes

preferences.name: aiRefinementMethod
preferences.title: AI Refinement Method
preferences.description: Choose which AI service to use for refining transcriptions

preferences.name: promptBeforeDictation
preferences.title: Choose AI prompt before each dictation
preferences.description: When enabled, you'll be asked to select an AI refinement prompt before each dictation session (only when AI refinement is enabled)
preferences.label: Ask for a prompt every time

preferences.name: aiModel
preferences.title: Raycast AI Model
preferences.description: Select which AI model to use for refinement

preferences.name: ollamaEndpoint
preferences.title: Ollama/API Endpoint
preferences.description: URL of your Ollama server or OpenAI compatible API (v1)

preferences.name: ollamaApiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: API key for authentication with the API server. Leave blank if not required.

preferences.name: ollamaModel
preferences.title: Model
preferences.description: Name of the model to use with Ollama/External API (e.g. llama3.2:latest, gpt-4o-mini, claude-3-5-haiku-latest)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
